resources.string: Application for Protozoan parasitic diseases in animals

There are certain rules for searching the Host Parasite Database.Choos one of the Host Animal Name and One of the Organ type and then search Go .It will show UP the list of Parsitic activity in the respective organ of the selected Animal with Parasite Type and Name. .
EASTERN REGIONAL STATION OF ICAR-IVRI, KOLKATA\n &\n ICAR RESEARCH COMPLEX FOR NEH REGION
